long: Meaning: "seven" (as the sacred "full" one); also (adverbially) "seven times"; by implication, a "week"; by extension, an "indefinite" number.  Usage: (  by) seven(-fold),-s, (-teen, -teenth), -th, times). Compare "H7658".  Source: or (masculine) ("שִׁבְעָה"); from "H7650"; a primitive cardinal number;
